alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Ojai Valley; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Ynez Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western San Fernando Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 11 at 1:02PM PST until January 12 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 31 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches, Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast, Santa Ynez Valley, Ojai Valley, Central Ventura County Valleys, Calabasas and Agoura Hills, Western San Fernando Valley and Southeastern Ventura County Valleys. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
